NF.Q: In the column Final Disposition of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 30528? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 13245 and 13943? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Carbon Storage to node Afforestation and from node Carbon Trading to node Afforestation, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Carbon Storage} to node {Afforestation} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Carbon Storage to node Afforestation and from node Pipeline to node Power Generation, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Carbon Storage} to node {Afforestation} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Air Cargo to node Power Generation, from node Agriculture to node Carbon Trading, and from node Pipeline to node Power Generation, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Carbon Storage to node Carbon Capture, from node Pipeline to node Transportation, and from node Residential to node Carbon Storage, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Final Disposition of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Pipeline to target node Carbon Capture? Please list all node labels along this path.
